title: RevNote Pro v1.0 android
description:
Requirements: 3.0+

Overview: RevNote is an easier way to study and get better grades.

Cramming doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t work so let RevNote make life easier. Whether you're studying at high school, university or even for a professional exam RevNote is statistically proven to improve your grades.

RevNote takes decades of psychological research pioneered by behaviourists Skinner (1961) & Watson (1921) as well as the social and cultural theories of Vygotsky (1962) and the cognitivist theory of Piaget (1936, 1975), and puts their work in the palm of your hand using your smartphone.

Using simple memory encoding techniques RevNote helps you develop meta-cognition and seamlessly integrates learning into your everyday life. Because this simple scaffolding technique allows your latent knowledge to grow, you to begin to abstract and apply what you have learned in more concrete terms making exams far easier.

Create as many classes from as many institutions as you like with no upper limit on the amount of questions you can create.

Select the frequency and method of quiz prompts in the settings and let RevNote do
the rest.

To create quiz questions simply list a keyword from your textbook and a description along with three associative terms. It's that easy.

Even the colour scheme luminosity has been carefully designed to minimise distraction during your reading as you create questions.

RevNote is 100% free to try.

Download RevNote today and watch your grades improve.

Features
-Simple, intuitive interface.
-Completely customisable to your study requirements.
-Can be used for any course of study at any learning institution anywhere.
-Create unlimited classes.
-Combine classes from multiple sources, e.g. school & driver's license & hobby
-Create unlimited questions.
-Customise how and when questions are asked.
-Grade system: Fail, Pass, Credit, Distinction & High Distinction.
-Get feedback on your overall performance.
-Get feedback on areas of study that need improvement.
-Low impact design to minimise interruption while reading study texts.
-Fits into your daily schedule with minimum interference.
-Share your results via social media to fellow students.
-Guaranteed no in-app advertisements. Ever.

This app has no advertisements
